mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS permissionId, p.permission_name AS permissionName FROM sys_role r, sys_role_permission rp, sys_permission p, sys_permission p1 WHERE (r.id = #{roleId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.id = rp.role_id AND rp.permission_id = p.id AND p.parent_id = 0) OR (r.id = #{roleId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.id = rp.role_id AND rp.permission_id = p1.id AND p1.parent_id = p.id) GROUP BY p.id

SELECT p.id AS permissionId, p.permission_name AS permissionName FROM sys_role r, sys_role_permission rp, sys_permission p WHERE r.id = #{roleId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.id = rp.role_id AND rp.permission_id = p.id GROUP BY p.id

SELECT p.id AS permissionId, p.permission_name AS permissionName FROM sys_permission p, sys_role_permission rp, sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND rp.role_id = ur.role_id AND p.id = rp.permission_id GROUP BY p.id
